contact.entity: Scuola Esperienziale Itinerante Di Agricoltura Biologica

description:
The "Scuola Esperienziale Itinerante di Agricoltura Biologica" ("Practice Based Itinerant School in Organic Agriculture") is an initiative of the cultural association "La Biolca", with sit in Padua, and has been offering seminars to members in various aspects of organic cultivation since 2004. 

Its main characteristic is that it does not have a main location but seminars are held, one weekend a month, at the farms of the various member teachers. The school favours a hands-on approach to learning agriculture, in the vein of the old craft schools. 

The students are guided for 12 months in learning the modules offered (horticulture and/or fruit growing) and, once the module is completed, guided by two tutors to start their own business, if necessary. 

The main purpose of the School is the training of new generations of organic farmers and agricultural technicians. It allows the development of practical and theoretical skills and a network of relationships among farmers. The School is one of the most influential educational realities in the field of organic farming in the Veneto region and some new trends in the area have arisen from it, for example the diffusion of social farms.
name: Scuola Esperienziale Itinerante di Agricoltura Biologica
